content: worked the first fdc into the same stitch from row 6 as my last regular double_crochet in row 7 skip 20 joiner stitch see special stitches then double_crochet to the end of the row 10dc 20fdc 70dc = 100dc total ch16 row 8 starting in 2nd chain from hook 3dc in each chain 45 double_crochet total continue with one double_crochet in each fdc 100dc then ch16 row 9 still with colour d starting in 2nd chain from hook 3dc in each chain 45 double_crochet total change colour in the end of the 45th double_crochet continuing the row now in colour e double_crochet in each double_crochet along the row 100dc ch16 row 10 starting in 2nd chain from hook 3dc in each chain 45 double_crochet total continue with one double_crochet in each fdc 100dc then ch16 row 11 still with colour e starting in 2nd chain from hook 3dc in each chain 45 double_crochet total change colour in the end of the 45th double_crochet continuing the row now in colour f double_crochet in each double_crochet along the row 100dc ch16 row 12 starting in 2nd chain from hook 3dc in each chain 45 double_crochet total continue with one double_crochet in each fdc 100dc then ch16 row 13 still with colour f starting in 2nd chain from hook 3dc in each chain 45 double_crochet total continue row with a slip_stitch in each double_crochet across 100slst fasten_off slip one end of the scarf through the hole at the other end team it with a curly shirley beanie and curly shirley cardi and your little girl will be the cutest little shirley around thanks for trying my pattern out - if you have any feedback on it or changes that i need to make please do contact me on beejam16@gmail com
